name: Rotten Toy
description:
The players play as brand new toys and must get through a zone full of old damaged toys that try to kill them and disassemble them to become new again. When they accomplish that, they get buffed and get stronger. This is limited to one enemy at a time only. All the weapons that the players can use can only be obtained by searching the map. There can be a small task the players must do to proceed. The players can pick up toy pieces to use as utility items to help them finish the game.

This game is currently in development and I will keep posting here in the dev logs the current state of the game.
